website_summaries.verdict: One of the sturdiest croquet sets available. Great natural-wood look.
pros: If you need a croquet set for adults or older children, this is a great option
Includes 6 mallets and balls in 6 colors, plus a carrying case, wickets, and stakes
cons: The carrying case is on the flimsy side
Some customers received duplicate color mallets

customer_reviews.title: Beefy and up to the task!
customer_reviews.text: We had a family croquet tournament this memorial day weekend and it was great. The wood is thick and sturdy. The croquet balls are the perfect material consistency. With some sets the balls are more stout than the wooden mallets...not this set. Spend the extra money and get this set. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: A number of years ago we ordered a Franklin croquet set and it was great. This one arrived and looked very sturdy. However, every time you hit the ball the mallets loosen up and the heads turn. We have purchased some plumbers tape to see if that will work. Also, the mallets are very short. Order the adult length!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C M Morris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Bother
customer_reviews.text: The stake broke with the seven person to hit it; one mallet broke on game number two; three balsa had chips or dents on them after game one; two wires were bent beyond repair the first time we packed it up; and another mallet broke in game two. This is with adult (read, typical) use, not kids beating them. We packed it back up and ordered a better set. Don’t bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The color rubbed off on my arms on the first game played. The paint should be lower on the mallet, not the top. The Amish do way better at making these sets, these are not build to last for the 50 years you will get out of an Amish set
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY AND PRICE
customer_reviews.text: NOBODY TOLD ME THIS WAS A KIDS SET. VERY DISAPPOINTED...
customer_reviews.author: Wise Old Dude

customer_reviews.title: 2 mallets same color
customer_reviews.text: You'dcthink that if you're supposed to have one mallet for each ball color that they would have given us different mallet colors. We are missing the red one but got two black
customer_reviews.author: Troy M. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of box! Absolute junk! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken when I took it out of box. Mallet was cracked at the base. Update: one mallet and one turn post broken after three uses (by children). Buyers beware! Very, very cheaply made with composite wood! Sent Franklin pictures, emails, etc. nothing from them! We bought two Franklin soccer goals and they were okay. These, not so much. Buy another brand! Cheap junk! Update #2: These things are absolute junk! Do not buy this product! Two more mallets broke today! Standard use, no horseplay, they just broke where the rings of color are! Unbelievably cheap! Junk!
customer_reviews.author: DealShoppingDaddyO

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the poorest quality item I have ever purchased from Amazon. Day 1 two handles were broken without rough handling . Day 3 the other two handles broken so no more mallets . Would discourage anyone from ordering this set .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality’s
customer_reviews.text: We had a nice family outing outdoors. Every single mallet broke during the first game. It was annoying and then became comical as 1 by 1 the mallet heads would fly off or the shaft would splinter into pieces. What a piece of junk this set was. RIP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Croquet Set
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used these yet but the quality seems very high which is what you would expect for the price. Just wish there was a rack for these instead of the flimsy bag which requires removing the mallet heats from the handles to store or transport.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: I know it was not an expensive set but I feel it should have lasted longer than one game.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not even deserve 1star. I played one game with my 6 year old grandson and two of the mallets broke before the end of the game. One the stick broke in half in the middle the other the stick broke off at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: jm23

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to play with my grandsons ages 5 and 6. I did not want to spend a lot if money in the set. Everything comes in a box with a handle so you will need to keep the box for storage. It is a decent set for the price-not high quality but again good for an inexpensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fun brings back memories from childhood.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it I laughed. I remember playing as a kid and the size was so small but, to my amazement it is sturdy and has held up to a six year old boy who like to hit every thing. We have played all summer no broken mallets.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Tried twice. Both sets broke within a week. Mallet heads come off. Wood breaks. I wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.author: desplin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this croquet set!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this croquet set. I ordered a more expensive one expecting a better set. Mallets do not stay tight, screws come out, affecting our swing. We are attempting to replace screws so we can use the set.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Crampton

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. This particular set is tiny. My kids used it a couple times and a few of the sticks broke. I returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice family activity
customer_reviews.text: Something to do outside during this quarantine with family. Kids enjoyed it more than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: s12ms

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: One mallet stick broke in half when screwing in the end before starting.
customer_reviews.author: charles lane

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy
customer_reviews.text: On the first time we played with this toy, the screw on one of the mallets was not adjusted properly so it was difficult to put together. Another mallet cracked during the first game, and the end pole also cracked during the first game. The mallets are extremely short (an I am only 5 feet tall!) We returned the item after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with the low quality and cheaply made product. The stick broke during the fist game.
customer_reviews.author: MHW

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - 2 mallets broke in first 10 minutes of play
customer_reviews.text: Just set this up straight out of the box for Easter tomorrow. Me and my 9 year old gave it a test play and we each broke a mallet with normal play! Super disappointed in the quality. Both mallets snapped in the same place near one of the notched areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Outside summer activity
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandkids and so far they really like the set.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cook

customer_reviews.title: missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Mine showed up with pieces missing. We got the mallets, balls and spikes but the little hoops you hit them through were missing from the box. We ended up making some of our own but it was a bit of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This set is very cheaply made! And ours was missing wickets. Worst product I've purchased in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Not as quality as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I have had various croquet sets over the years. They lasted through years of use. This one is junk. Mallet broke on second game. I thought I was purchasing the better quality set
customer_reviews.author: James M. Janowski

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately out of box
customer_reviews.text: Broke trying to get the stakes into the ground. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got this crocket set this week, first time playing today and one the mallets broke within the first 5 minutes of playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Cespedes

customer_reviews.title: quarantine fun!
customer_reviews.text: set this up in the back yard and it has been hours of fun while we are stuck at home! we took the plastic covers off the mallets and seems to work better.
customer_reviews.author: aneypoo

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality Croquet Set
customer_reviews.text: We three hosted 3 UVA graduating fourth year young men for a BBQ and croquet game. This croquet set is well built, sturdy, handsome and stood up to a couple competitive games with three 22 year old boys playing the game “energetically.”
customer_reviews.author: Steven Benton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, Solid mallet heads that fit securely to shafts. Everything about the set seems first class.
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: Nice kids set
customer_reviews.text: Good kids set. Balls are light, sticks are short and feel a little hollow/lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Sica

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The picture makes it look a lot nicer than they really are. Balls are small as well.
customer_reviews.author: TEF

customer_reviews.title: UPS
customer_reviews.text: The croquet set is great. However, UPS delivery left it on a neighbor’s porch two streets over. Luckily our neighbor and his son brought it to our house last night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made cheap
customer_reviews.text: Made very cheap, pegs broke the first time we played, plastic tips came off mallets the first time we played also
customer_reviews.author: Tralin Shively

customer_reviews.title: Too bad!!
customer_reviews.text: The croquet wood mallets broke before we started to play. This is a waste of money if you are planing to buy this go for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Pruneda

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Played a few games and then 2 mallets and stake broke. Will be returning this set. Not high quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Had this set for maybe two months when the mallets kept breaking and splitting. Not at all recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mastro1213

customer_reviews.title: Way to small
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a standard size it is way to small
customer_reviews.author: sherri winkler

customer_reviews.title: Cheat made all stick broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: 3 sticks broke while is use br 7 year old dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality all around
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this Franklin Croquet set. The entire set feels cheaply made, down to the plastic end caps on the mallets. They wear out quickly. As a striking surface, the ends ought to be rubberized or made of thick, durable plastic, not cheap bottle-cap like material. The wood (possibly pine, given the texture and weight) also feels really cheap, with an ugly varnish. Seriously, I've seen broom handles made of better quality wood. My wife played for about half an hour with our toddler and reported that the mallet heads keep getting loose. I don't recommend this set at all unless you are looking for a cheap set that lasts only a season.
customer_reviews.author: BBP

customer_reviews.title: All around excellent set!
customer_reviews.text: A fun set with all the parts needed to take the croquet game on the road. The bright "all weather" colors make the balls easy to see. The mallets and stakes are made of wood, so they are showing some wear over time from use, but keeping them stored in the bag (rather than left outside) has likely extended their life. These are shorter mallets, which is what I'm use to playing with. I think the reason for that is that shorter mallets are easier to transport. It's not the cheapest set available, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Roger N. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Good Times
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these sets when my kids were very young. We played as a family until the mallets broke due to the rambunctious kids. Never got around to getting another set. The kids are older and now we have a set to play with again. Very well made and comes in a neat carrying case so we can take it on trips. The first thing the family said was, "Oh I remember this!" We have had a lot of fun with this set and plan on using it quite often. Solid set and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fett

customer_reviews.title: Basic, simple set
customer_reviews.text: If you want to play croquet, and aren't hard core about it...this should be an excellent set. It's really designed for the casual player. Perhaps someone who puts out the set in the summer time for occasional backyard fun with the kids. It is not very heavy duty and with heavy use (or abuse) it will start to fall apart. The mallets are perfectly acceptable, but also don't feel as sturdy as a baseball bat. The paint on the balls will start coming off after awhile. The "gates" are easily bendable. Having said all that, don't let yourself be deterred. The price is reasonable, and you will enjoy the set. We certainly have.
customer_reviews.author: RMurray847

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: This croquet set is such fun! I played with my young cousins, and they quickly picked up the ins-and-outs of the game. The mallets come in two pieces, but they screw together easily. The only thing I didn't love is that all of the balls showed some dents after we played twice, and the white plastic covering the ends of the mallets broke off of one mallet. So it's probably not the most durable set, but it's good for kids. Also, in order to store everything in the box, you have to take apart the mallets--I'm not sure how long they'll last that way. But, like I said, as a basic set, this is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R.

customer_reviews.title: Our kids actually think croquet is cool now.
customer_reviews.text: Our kids think croquet is now cool; thanks Franklin. They have had a blast knocking the balls around, and competing against each other. The mallets are decent, and the balls seem well made. The problem with this set is that, once assembled, it won't fit back into the bag. You must unscrew the mallet heads from the sticks in order to make them fit. This will become annoying after a few times. Also, this will wear down the threading in the hammer head. I would suggest getting yourself a lager storage bag, and use that.
customer_reviews.author: Water Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Croquet for the kids !
customer_reviews.text: This croquet set was simple to put together and a wonderful basic set for backyard play for children (not recommend it if only playing with adults--it's too small). It seems to be durable--time will tell--but overall was a fine time activity, and the granddaughters love playing with their neighborhood friends. The set comes with 4 wood mallets, 2 wood stakes, 9 wire wickets, and 4 colored all-weather balls. It is definitely recommend for younger kids and a fine way to discover the joys of a neat sport.
customer_reviews.author: JEDrury

customer_reviews.title: Great time with family
customer_reviews.text: I had so much fun using this croquet set with my family. It comes with all of the needed equipment, directions, and a carrying case. It took us a while to set up the game since it had been such a long time since either my husband or I had played the game. Low grass is the best substrate to play on--longer grass makes the balls bump around and get stuck and dirt gets dusty. The wooden mallets, balls, stakes, etc. were all great quality so this set will last for some time. Excellent product, overall!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Solid professional set
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I did not realize how complicated the game could be. I watched some videos and I see now why a good set costs so much. If you take this game seriously, then you want a solid sturdy set. So far, I have not had any problems. The sticks screw on tightly to the mallet heads. The colors are bright and seem like they will last a while without fading. The bag is nice to store the set but the mallets have to be taken apart to fit nicely. Overall this is a great set for a serious beginner.
customer_reviews.author: PearlGirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I loved to play croquet as a child and remember long afternoons and evenings playing at my grandmother’s house. But one always wonders how to store them when not in use. This lovely set comes with a specially designed bag. This solves the problem of having the sets collect dust in the garage. It also makes it easy to transport to the park or on vacation. So far, no chips on the balls or stakes. Can’t wait to play more this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: A game for all generations...
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy-duty croquet set built to last through the generations. I was able to introduce three generations to the game over the holidays, and they caught on quickly and wanted to play over and over. Fortunately, we live in a spot where the grass is green all year, so we are able to leave this set up, and get in some games and practice before another family visit. The mallets are sturdy, brightly painted as are the balls. The family loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: This wooden set is made very well. It brought back memories of childhood-it looks just like the set we had minus the wooden storage cart. Detailing is done well, making the mallets pop. Balls roll well and are easy to control with a little practice. Super activity for back yard celebrations. And, more people can play at one time than corn hole.
customer_reviews.author: ardnam

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love this
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a starter set as the quality is a bit sub-par. Additionally, from the photos, I assumed the handles would be longer and they are quite short–suitable only for kids really. But the set is fully functional and will be a huge hit with the nieces and nephews this spring. I was tempted to give this only a three-star rating but the price really is quite good for what you get. For $25 you can keep the kids entertained for hours (or maybe even days!).
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Carrying Bag Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This is, as far as I can tell, the real deal. It is easy to put together, albeit with some elbow grease. All the colors are there. The stakes are solid. The wire wickets poke into the ground easily. It comes with a storage bag but you've got to take apart the mallets to get them to fit. It isn't difficult, but it is a hassle, particularly as you've got to tighten the mallets strongly. --Brockeim
customer_reviews.author: Brockeim

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Mallets are sturdy and overall the quality is excellent. One of my favorite games for outside if you can get a few people together! Unfortunately now it is winter so I can't really use, I do have it readily accessible once Spring arrives in full bloom. I had a set at one point but over the years it rusted and I have lost pieces so it is nice to get a new one now to create some new fun memories with!
customer_reviews.author: Fighting Sioux

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played croquet in at least 40 years. It was always something that would come out at picnics and other outdoor gatherings. This set has al you need for 6 players. One of the reviews noted the mallet heads came off the handles. I got some waterproof glue, glued the heads on, and tapped them in place with a rubber mallet to insure they were fully seated. They are solid as a rock now. The set seems well made and should last a long time. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy from start to finish
customer_reviews.text: This is described as.a.started croquet set, so I thought it might be.lighter than.I have traditionally handled. Well, it is not light at all, and is nicely finished.all wood, except the side wickets, or course. It comes in a box with a handle, which will be useless once the mallsts.are.assembled. This is just the malldts, balls, stakes, and wickets -- no rack or.bag for.storage, but it is a.good set for family use. We can figure out a.bag for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Game
customer_reviews.text: This is described as a starter croquet set but don't think this is lightweight. It's all wood except the side wickets. This set has 2 golf toss targets, 3 each of red and blue golf tosses. No rack or bag for storage. This is a great game for kids and adults and, depending on where you live, can be played year round. I can't wait for warmer weather to play this one.
customer_reviews.author: VS Grenier

customer_reviews.title: Well made set
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made croquet set. Croquet sets are pretty straight forward, so there isn’t a whole lot to say, but it is solid wood and seems like it will hold up to years of use. It comes with instructions and it’s own carrying case so you can easily take it with you to a friends house or even on vacation. Overall I am pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: sec682

customer_reviews.title: Top quality croquet set that will last
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality croquet set and I know it will last many, many seasons. I recall fond memories of playing this game with my brothers as a youngster and now we're making memories with the children. The set is exactly what I remember and the included instructions are easy to understand and follow. If you've ever wanted to get outdoors and play a great old-fashioned game, give this croquet set a try.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Ok set
customer_reviews.text: This Franklin Sports Croquet Set - Includes Croquet Wood Mallets, All Weather Balls, Wood Stakes and Metal Wickets - Classic Family Outdoor Game was not great. It's ok, but a little overpriced, I think. The mallets were poorly finished and the wickets were flimsy. Overall, a fun game, just not a fabulous set.
customer_reviews.author: CCE

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new croque set as the last one was left outside too many summers (around 4) so I ordered this one over others based on the Franklin name and it delivered once again. Not sure about the "professional" tag but the mallets and croque balls appear to be well made and should survive a few BBQ seasons. I'd recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Curious One

customer_reviews.title: Fun memories
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the things from our childhood that gave us many forever memories are the best to share with our grandchildren. I loved croquet as a child and am enjoying introducing it to my grandkids. It is so nice to have something that gets them away from screens and outdoors. This set is similar to the one I remember. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Family fun at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Growing up my parents had a croquet set, so when I came across this I largely bought it for nostalgia for use at family gatherings. The set comes with everything you need which packs into a convenient case. While I would have preferred it came with a traditional rack, but for the price I can do without and won’t knock it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Post

customer_reviews.title: Price does not equal quality
customer_reviews.text: After unboxing and playing a round, I can definitively say, this kit should be twenty bucks. The mallets are of pretty low quality. I remember playing this with my grandparents as a kid and naturally they were made much better. This isn't something which will stick around for generations to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mmm

customer_reviews.title: awesome set
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome croquet set. My kids love to play croquet and many sets we have owned have been cheaply made. This is a great set and it works well and is very durable. It is so much fun to play. easy to set up and play. This set comes with a great bag to store and carry the set in. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice set, but not as nice as they used to be made
customer_reviews.text: The wood is lightweight which is great for traveling, but they aren't as sturdy as the old ones. The old ones could take a licking and keep on playing. These are about medium grade.
customer_reviews.author: momofmany

customer_reviews.title: A Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement to my granddaughter's other set. We took it to my husband's company pick up and needless to say they broke two of the sticks. How, I haven't the slightest idea. This set has 2 golf toss targets, 3 each of red and blue golf tosses. Can't wait for warm weather to play this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ymjauthor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: This is a top-notch high-quality croquet set. All the pieces are very well constructed. The case for the set is very well-designed and the whole thing packs away very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Paulybrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Well made set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice croquet set. It's strong, well made, and easy to put together. It comes in a bag that is also strong and well made, making it convenient to pack up for storage and/or to take places. Everything you need is included and our family had a blast playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kemgbr

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't like croquet
customer_reviews.text: Playing croquet in the south is a time honored tradition and families love to play. I needed a new set so we could play. This fills the need. This is great to play and to teach the young family members to play. Then they get their own set to play.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: This set from Franklin Sports has all you need for hours of backyard family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Croquet is not just the sport of kings. This set from Franklin Sports has all you need for hours of backyard family fun! Up to six players or teams can enjoy a nice game of croquet. Sets up and breaks down easily and comes with a handy carry-bag for all. Get your wickets up!
customer_reviews.author: Ray J. Palen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Croquet is a fun family game that is perfect for backyards or camping trip. The box comes with everything needed to play the game for 4 players . The set has 4 all weather molded balls, 2 painted wood stakes and 9 all weather coated bent wire wickets. It is well made and sturdy. This is a fun family game .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality, nice-looking croquet set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice-looking, quality croquet set. If you need a smaller set (4 player), but no carry bag, Franklin Sports also makes a 4 player set. This is a great game for kids and adults and, depending on where you live, can be played year round.
customer_reviews.author: MomtoBoys

customer_reviews.title: Good for starters!
customer_reviews.text: I may have played croquet before, but I’ve not owned my own set until this one. I love that it’s a full set with colored balls and paddles, and the stakes are simple and easy to pound into the grass. The mallets are lighter than I expected. It is great for a beginner’s set!
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, quality croquet set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice-looking, quality croquet set. If you need a larger set (6 player) and a carry bag, Franklin Sports also makes a 6 player set. This is a great game for kids and adults and, depending on where you live, can be played year round.
customer_reviews.author: MomtoBoys

customer_reviews.title: Great starter croquet set, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this croquet set, good quality for what you are paying. This set should easily last 2-3 years, and your family will have a lot of fun with it. If you don't have a set yet, get this one. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bevers

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a fan of Franklin Sports, but this set isn't bad. It's solidly built and even though the paint isn't perfect it is clear enough who is who. Set up is easy with screw on heads and play is exactly what you would expect. I'm happy enough with these.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Croquet Set for 6 Players, Franklin Sports
customer_reviews.text: This is not an expensive set, but it is pretty durable. I love the fall and love to entertain outside. This is one of our go-to games. We also have horseshoes, corn-hole, darts, and badminton. My backyard is always a fun place!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Lots of family fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the family to get started playing croquet. Not as heavy as the professional mallets, so this works for children as young as 4-5. Looks like this will be a favorite family game, so it was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice croquet set at an affordable price. And would make a nice father's day or birthday gift for dad or grandpa. This will be so much fun in the spring when the weather gets a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-quality croquet set
customer_reviews.text: This isn't, you know, heirloom-quality, but for backyard family play, it's more than adequate, and you shouldn't have any problems with durability or function.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the young and the old. Hours of family fun! Make sure you have access to somewhat flat and soft grass for the gates. Comes with a convienient storage bag too, which I really, really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Everson

customer_reviews.title: everything you need for an afternoon of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a very solid croquet set. Truly, everything you need for an afternoon of fun. I had forgotten how fun croquet is. Perfect backyard activity.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice croquet set. Good quality product. Feels like it will last awhile. Game is very portable. Stores in a bag when not playing b
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and colorful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, sturdy croquet set. The balls are beautifully colored and the wickets look like they will hold up in play.
customer_reviews.author: D. Salvagin, La Deetda Reads

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality croquet set. It has everything needed to play. My kids were able to set it up themselves. Everything is well made and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set for family fun! Well done, with a great bag to keep it all. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Product very cheaply made. One mallet broke first time use. Croquet balls are smaller than regulation size making it difficult to roquet another ball. Would not recommend this product. One star because of value, otherwise would give a zero👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Croquet Set - Includes Croquet Wood Mallets, All Weather Balls, Wood Stakes and Metal Wickets - Classic Family Outdoor Game
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL GRADE: This durable professional croquet set is designed for hours of fun and challenge. Experience the excitement of a classic with the Franklin croquet set that’s engineered for dependable use, year after year

EVERYTHING YOU NEED: With six 3. 31 Inches colored croquet balls, 6 coordinating wooden mallets, 24 Inches colored wooden stakes, and 9 wickets designed for all-weather use and portability, it’s everything you need in one croquet set

6-PLAYER-READY: Up to 6 players can challenge each other in a game of croquet, thanks to the colorful coordinating designs of this Franklin croquet set. Impress friends and family with a sturdy croquet set that’s built for competition and challenge

QUALITY-MADE: Practice croquet or have fun with friends—this quality-made professional croquet set lasts for season after season and is easy to learn how to play with. The wooden croquet mallets have durable metal locking joints for added longevity
BONUS CARRYING CASE: Take this versatile croquet set anywhere with the bonus carrying case. Enjoy a classic outdoor game in the backyard or anywhere else, thanks to the portable carrying case
